channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Contained - Brush Fire; INC#1701; 09:45PM; 12844 Maclay St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PQQwYl; #Sylmar; LAFD personnel have stopped forward progress of the fire at less than two (2) acres of grass and brush. No injury. No structures. As the fire has extended into the Federal Responsibility Area, they will be joined by responders from the Angeles National Forest and a hand crew from the Los Angeles County Fire Department in completing the fire perimeter to assure full extinguishment. Though witnesses describe fireworks being used in the area at the time the fire started, the specific cause of this fire has yet to be determined. ; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 BC15 CM40 CM42 E108 E18 E275 E290 E298 E39 E7 E75 E77 E81 E8140 E87 E90 E91 E98 EM15 H2 H3 H4 H7 HA2 HA3 HA4 HA7 T75 T90 T98 WT77 + ANF + LACoFD; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

Brush Fire; INC#1701; 09:03PM; 12844 Maclay St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PQQwYl; #Sylmar; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response to less than one-half (0.50) acre light-to-medium brush. No structures threatened.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 BC15 E18 E275 E290 E298 E75 E77 E8140 E87 E90 E91 E98 EM15 H2 H3 H7 HA2 HA3 HA7 T75 T90 T98 WT77; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

Grass Fire; INC#1165; 03:39PM; SB110 Freeway transition to WB 105 Freeway; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JRIzP7; #VermontVista; PRELIM: One-half (0.50) acre grass burning northwest of the 110/105 Freeway interchange. Closure of one or more lanes on the SB110 Freeway transition road to the WB 105 Freeway. First arriving LAFD crews will handle. No structure threat.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; E264 E79 T64; CH7; Brian Humphrey

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0152; 04:21AM; 690 S Park View St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JLyPpd; Westlake; KNOCKDOWN: Over 90 firefighters extinguished the Major Emergency structure fire in one hour and 35 minutes with no injuries reported. The extent of damage to the adjacent two buildings is being determined. The residents evacuated from the four story apartment building on the Bravo (east) side are able to rehouse. LAFD Arson is on scene for the investigation per protocol for an incident of this size. Traffic will be affected well into the morning as crews (some are being released) continue with the overhaul operations. No further details at this time.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E13 E20 E201 E203 E209 E210 E211 E220 E226 E229 E235 E26 E3 E35 E6 E9 EA1 EM1 EM11 EM13 HE1 RA10 RA11 RA29 RA3 RA6 RA811 RS3 SQ21 T1 T10 T11 T20 T26 T29 T3 T35 T9 UR3; CH7; 12 13 14 15; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire (South LA); INC#0178; 03:49AM; 838 E 29th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NLjc2p; Historic South-Central; KNOCKDOWN: Over 40 firefighters extinguished the fire in 25 minutes with no injuries reported. There were no other structures exposed. Firefighters will be onscene through the morning for overhaul operations. No further details.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 BC14 CM40 CM42 E14 E15 E17 E215 E221 E233 E46 EM13 EM15 RA14 T15 T21 T33; CH9; 16; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0152; 03:51AM; 690 S Park View St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JLyPpd; Westlake; Units have made good progress on the original fire building. They are starting to shut down the ladder pipe operations so they can transition to hand lines to reach the remaining fire. There is some (amount unknown) of extension into the Delta exposure (attached building on the west side). The attached 4 story apartment building on the Bravo (east) side being evacuated (number unknown), the status of possible fire extension into the structure is unknown at this time. ; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E13 E20 E201 E203 E209 E210 E211 E220 E226 E229 E235 E26 E3 E35 E6 E9 EM1 EM11 EM13 HE1 RA10 RA11 RA3 RA6 RA811 RS3 SQ21 T1 T10 T11 T20 T26 T29 T3 T35 T9 UR3; CH7; 12 13 14 15; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire (South LA); INC#0178; 03:24AM; 838 E 29th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NLjc2p; Historic South-Central; One story, commercial building (50' x 30') with heavy fire showing upon arrival. Firefighters are entering the defensive mode.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E14 E15 E221 RA14 T21; CH9; 16; Margaret Stewart

Trapped Vehicle ; INC#0137; 03:11AM; Sb 405 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pzKeBZ; Bel-Air; AT 2:29AM LAFD responded to a single vehicle traffic accident with three people trapped. Firefighters conducted an auto extrication operation and all three patients (age/gender/condition unknown) were transported to the hospital. SB405FY at Getty Center offramp were closed by CHP. Any questions are referred to CHP Log# 0233; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC9 E109 E19 E288 E292 E59 E71 E88 EM9 HR3 RA19 RA59 RA71 RA88 T88 T92 UR88; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0152; 03:07AM; 690 S Park View St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JLyPpd; Westlake; With heavy fire through the roof, the Incident Commander is transitioning this to a defensive operation. All firefighters are off the roof and out of the interior of the fire building. The adjacent 4 story apartment building is the primary exposure and firefighters are focused on defending it from fire extension. There are no injuries reported. Two additional task forces requested makes this a Major Emergency structure fire.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E11 E13 E203 E209 E210 E211 E220 E229 E3 E6 E9 EM11 RA11 RA3 RA811 SQ21 T10 T11 T20 T29 T3 T9 UR3; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0152; 02:46AM; 690 S Park View St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JLyPpd; Westlake; Two story (residential over commercial) building with fire on the 2nd floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode and facing multiple forcible entry challenges on the 1st floor. Additional resources are enroute and this incident is at the Greater Alarm status. ; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E11 E13 E203 E209 E210 E211 E3 E6 E9 EM11 RA11 RA3 RA811 SQ21 T10 T11 T3 T9 UR3; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart
